item.description:
It’s not uncommon to hear about major companies facing issues with cyberattacks. Recently, incidents involving the Swedish Church and Coop have been in the spotlight, highlighting the prevalence of ransomware.

When dealing with a large IT system critical to operations, it’s crucial to carefully consider how to manage and plan for ransomware attacks.

Whether it’s a personal laptop, a terminal in a store, or a server infrastructure for a major site, the principles remain the same.
